English: Sun Tzu, also known as Sun Wu `孫~`武~|孙`武~[Sun1 Wu3] (c. 500 BC, dates of birth and death uncertain), general, strategist and philosopher of the Spring and Autumn Period (700-475 BC), believed to be the author of the “Art of War” `孫子兵法~|孙`子~`兵法~[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China `武~`經~`七~`書~|`武~经`七~书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
